Package com.hrtool.service

Class EmployeeService

java.lang.Object
com.hrtool.service.EmployeeService
@Service
public class EmployeeService
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
edpape This class is responsible for all the possible employee operations.

      Returns:

      This operation associates an employee with a boss.
      Parameters:
      idEmployee - id of the employee that is going to be associated with a boss.
      idBoss - id of the boss that is going to be associated with the employee.
      Returns:

    • rate

      public EmployeeRate rate​(RateRequest rate)
      Creates a rate for an employee
      Parameters:
      rate - a rate request containing the id of the employee to be rated, the id of the employee that is doing the rate, and the rate.
      Returns:
      returns the employee rate stored in the database.

    • rate

      public java.util.List<EmployeeRate> rate​(java.util.List<RateRequest> rates)
      Creates multiple rates for multiple employees
      Parameters:
      rates - a list of rates.
      Returns:
      the list of rates stored in the database.

      Looks for the goals of a given employee
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      List of goals or an Empty list if none are found.
